Remain seated and keep your arms and legs inside the vehicle!

Submit your safety signs and videos to the Safety First! billboard contest.
Winner will receive the DLC of their choice!

Contest ends June 1st 12AM CDT / 6AM BST. Maximum of 3 submissions.
